comments.body: It is not a blocker to merge this but I am usually keeping the `vc10` option even though `conda-forge` is not building it. That way others can use the recipe without modifying it much.
Thanks @ocefpaf for merging. BTW this package will not build with anything less than `vc14` on Windows anyway due to `mpfr`, but will remember for future.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@    features:
        - vc9  # [win and py27]
        - vc14  # [win and py>=35]
        
requirements:
